name: An Otter Wizard
description:
Weekly Game Jam - Week 205

Theme: Unconventional Superpowers

How to play:

 You have the power of becoming invulnerable! But only when you close your eyes. If you time your invulnerability right, you can absorb enemy spells! But beware, Crocs and Crows will still hurt your bones!

WASD - Move

Right Click  - Shoot

Left Click - Close your eyes (become invulnerable and absorb enemy projectiles)

E - Use special

Game Designers:

ChrystianZer0 - Artist, Sound Designer

DuGringo - Programmer

Fornaree - Artist

William Silva - Animator, Sound Designer

Musics by Strobotone

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Strobotone

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!
